blurb: Unison is a friendly programming language from the future: statically-typed, functional, and a lot of fun. ðŸ˜„ Each Unison definition is identified by a hash of its syntax tree. Put another way, Unison code is content addressed

key_features.title: Content addressed
key_features.content: A Unison definition is identified by a hash of its syntax tree. Your code is not just mutable text.

key_features.title: Immutable
key_features.content: A Unison codebase is stored in an immutable, append only database.

key_features.title: Functional
key_features.content: Unison is a statically typed, general purpose functional programming langauge.

key_features.title: Distributed systems
key_features.content: Describe entire distributed systems in one program. Easily communicate across network boundaries.

key_features.title: Type safe
key_features.content: Capture effectful computations in Unison's type system with algebraic effects

key_features.title: Delightful
key_features.content: Programming should be joyful. Our tooling and community is here to help.
